alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 7:29PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Caribou, northwestern Bannock, northeastern Power and south central Bingham Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 728 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with strong outflow winds over Pocatello Airport, or near Pocatello, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, eastern American Falls Reservoir, Chubbuck, Fort Hall Buffalo Lodge, Fort Hall Townsite, Fort Hall Mount Putnam, Pocatello Airport, and Fort Hall Putnam Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blackfoot Mountains; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
